root.name: Invincible Knight
root.description: OverviewInvincible Knight is a side scrolling action game developed by Keystone Game Studio for the PlayStation 3. In it, the player must keep his mounted knight's speed up and slice through the horde of enemies invading the Kingdom of Frea before time runs out. Published by Sony Computer Entertainment Asia, it was released in Hong Kong and other Asian countries on November 21st, 2012.
